title: Asim assumes charge as MD APP
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 9 (APP): Director General Cyber Wing, Ministry of Information and Broadcasting, Muhammad Asim on Thursday assumed additional responsibilities as Managing Director of the official news agency Associated Press of Pakistan (APP).
Executive Director APP Adnan Akram Bajwa, directors and employees of the organization warmly welcomed him on his arrival at the APP headquarters.
Muhammad Asim, an officer of the Information Group of 26 Common Training Program, has a distinguished career span of 21 years with diversified experience. He has served in Press Information Department, Cyber Wing, Prime Minister House, Audit Bureau of Circulation, Pakistan Electronic Media Regulatory Authority and the Capital Development Authority.
